Package com.clarkparsia.common.iterations

Contains classes for defining and using Iterations which are analogous to standard Java Iterators with the exception that they are closeable and can throw an exception when calling Iteration#hasNext or Iteration#next.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Iteration<T,E extends Throwable> New iterator interface.
PeekingIteration<T,E extends Exception> An iteration which exposes the next element it will return.
SupportsIteration<T,E extends Throwable> Interface for marking something that can be iterated over via an Iteration, analogous to Iterable
 

Class Summary
AbstractIteration<T,E extends Throwable> Abstract implementation of the Iteration interface providing an implementation for all the basic methods of the interface.
ArrayIteration<T,E extends Exception> Implementation of an Iteration backed by an array.
DelegatingIteration<T,E extends Exception> Implementation of an Iteration which delegates its methods to a child Iteration.
Iterations Utility class for working with Iterations
MultiIteration<T,E extends Throwable> An adapter to provide a single iteration over a list of iterations.
TransformIteration<I,O,E extends Throwable> Implementation of an Iteration which will apply a function to transform the results of an inner iterator to a different type.
 

Package com.clarkparsia.common.iterations Description

Contains classes for defining and using Iterations which are analogous to standard Java Iterators with the exception that they are closeable and can throw an exception when calling Iteration#hasNext or Iteration#next.
